allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

getVoterState(uint256,address).details: This is not meant to be used on-chain

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

params._minParticipationPct: Percentage of total voting power that must participate in a survey for it to be taken into account (expressed as a 10^18 percentage, (eg 10^16 = 1%, 10^18 = 100%)
params._surveyTime: Seconds that a survey will be open for token holders to vote
params._token: MiniMeToken address that will be used as governance token

params._options: Number of options voters can decide between

newSurvey(string,uint256).return: surveyId id for newly created survey

resetVote(uint256).details: Initialization check is implicitly provided by `surveyExists()` as new surveys can only     be created via `newSurvey(),` which requires initialization

params._token: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

voteOption(uint256,uint256).details: Initialization check is implicitly provided by `surveyExists()` as new surveys can only     be created via `newSurvey(),` which requires initializationIt will use the whole balance.

voteOptions(uint256,uint256[],uint256[]).details: Initialization check is implicitly provided by `surveyExists()` as new surveys can only     be created via `newSurvey(),` which requires initialization

params._optionIds: Array with indexes of supported options
params._stakes: Number of tokens assigned to each option

initialize(address,uint64,uint64).notice: Initialize Survey app with `_token.symbol(): string` for governance, minimum acceptance participation of `@formatPct(_minParticipationPct)`%, and a voting duration of `@transformTime(_surveyTime)`

newSurvey(string,uint256).notice: Create a new non-binding survey about "`_metadata`"

resetVote(uint256).notice: Reset previously casted vote in survey #`_surveyId`, if any.

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.

voteOptions(uint256,uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Vote for multiple options in survey #`_surveyId`.
